code: import React from"react";import Header from"./Header";import Footer from"./Footer";import'../styles/LoginECadastro.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Recuperacao=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const envioDeEmail=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert(`email enviado para: ${email}`);navigate('/CodigoDeRecuperacao');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"contact",class:"main-bg section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"main-content intro-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"intro-text-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"contact-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:envioDeEmail,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("fieldset",{class:"form-grid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Recupera\xE7\xE3o de senha"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("legend",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group-l",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),type:"email",name:"email",id:"email",placeholder:"Insira seu Email",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"form-group-l",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{class:"reduce-space-little",children:"Enviaremos um c\xF3digo de verifica\xE7\xE3o a este e-mail se corresponder a uma conta da TechFree."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"form-group-l",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Avan\xE7ar"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"form-group-l",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Login",class:"btn-voltar",children:"Voltar"})})]})})})})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Recuperacao;
